text: Nimutamutabara (Intumwa Muhamadi), rwose (ntacyo bizamutwara) kuko Allah yamaze kumutabara ubwo abahakanye bamumeneshaga ari uwa kabiri muri babiri, igihe bombi (Intumwa Muhamadi na Abubakari) bari mu buvumo, (Intumwa Muhamadi) ikabwira mugenzi wayo (Abubakari) iti “Wibabara kuko mu by’ukuri Allah ari kumwe natwe.” Nuko Allah amanura ituze rimuturutseho, anamushyigikiza ingabo (abamalayika) mutabonaga, maze ijambo ry’abahakanye aricisha bugufi, naho ijambo rya Allah rishyirwa hejuru, kandi Allah ni Umunyacyubahiro bihebuje, Nyirubugenge buhambaye
